text: Xinkaꞌyik kꞌa te xinwilo jun qꞌana kej, kꞌo jun kejeninaq chirij ubꞌiꞌnam Kamikal, tereneꞌtal rumal ri kꞌamal kibꞌe ri ajawarem rech ri kamikal. Che we jun riꞌ xyaꞌtaj ri kwinem rech kuꞌkamisaj ri ukaj qꞌat chike ri winaq rech uwachulew rukꞌ sakꞌibꞌal, numik, chꞌoꞌj, rukꞌ yabꞌilal xuqujeꞌ kumal e juyubꞌil taq aꞌwaj.
